content.rendered:
• To offer industry integrated education to its BC Agents, Gram Tarang in collaboration with Centurion University of Technology and Management launched a 3 year BBA program in Finance and Financial Inclusion in June’ 14 in the states of Assam, Bihar and shall expand to other states soon.
  • Gram Tarang Inclusive Development Services Pvt. Ltd. got mandate for doing as a BC in Financial Inclusion under ‘United Bank of India’ at Manipur state.
